name: The Ballantyne Hotel and Lodge

reviews.text: My wife and I went to Charlotte, NC for a personal event and stayed at the Ballantyne Resport for 1 full week. We are Starwood members and the Ballantyne is a starwood property. We stayed all week on starwood points which were an exceptional value for the quality hotel.
reviews.title: Southern Hospitality, Great Value.

likes.liked: — Friendliness of staff, cleanliness of rooms
likes.disliked: — small amount of highway noise can be heard

reviews.text: Upon check in we were greeted by a very friendly valet who helped us unload the car and then tipped us to the fact that we could enjoy free parking on the parking lot if we like. This was very thoughtful and certainly helpful as we did not need valet service after check in.
reviews.title: Loved the Ballantyne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At the reception the receptionist let us know that we were being upgraded to a suite as the hotel was not very busy. The Ballantyne certainly didn't have to do this and its always a pleasant surprise to receive a free upgrade.
reviews.title: Very Classy

likes.disliked: — Had to pay separately for Internet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our suite was very clean and nicely decorated in southern decor.
reviews.title: Fantastic

likes.liked: — Spa Service and cleanliness of room

reviews.text: Our room was overlooking the golf greens and with 2 balconies was certainly more than enough space for the two of us.
reviews.title: Loved the Ballantyne

reviews.text: I have been staying at the Ballantyne Resort since 2002 I guess. The resort is fabulous. Most of my meetings are downtown. It is about 20 minutes, depending on traffic can be a bit longer. The staff is great. There is a great little bar downstairs, good for a late evening drink after dining out.
reviews.title: Ballantyne is Top Notch

reviews.text: Rooms have enormous Moldings, great beds, and decorated with charm. The only thing the room needs are flat panels. That is the only part that lacks, I am a Starwood Platinum member so get upgraded to the suites frequently...they are wonderful overlooking the golf course. I have played it 3 times, great course, in great shape as long as they don't go into a drought like 2 summers ago.
reviews.title: Beautiful resort in the suburbs of Charlotte

likes.liked: — Clean, classic resort with updated large rooms and excellent service.
likes.disliked: — A little far from downtown Charlotte so might not be convenient for some.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tons of shopping and some good restaurants close by. Check out Villa for drinks...dark, fun little bistro like bar.
reviews.title: I expected more.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You will feel like you are home when you crash on your pillow.
reviews.title: Luxurious

reviews.text: Great resort.
reviews.title: Outstanding Service, Beautiful Rooms

likes.liked: — Warm and friendly staff, spacious and luxurious accommodations
likes.disliked: — Golf carts parked in handicapped parking spaces

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Ballantyne Resort is an elegant hotel in a great section of Charlotte NC. The room was beautifully decorated, comfortable and spotlessly clean.
reviews.title: Elegant hotel

likes.disliked: — Front of hotel is on a busy road.

reviews.text: All staff members were friendly and courteous with a respectful attitude fitting this hotel.
reviews.title: Dripping with Luxury

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food in the two restaurants we tried was above average.
reviews.title: Great Weekend Getaway

likes.disliked: — Golf course closed, limited late night in-room dining menu.

reviews.text: The only complaint would be the location on a busy road. If your room faces this way, it greatly diminishes the resort feel. Rooms facing the golf course had the proper atmosphere.
reviews.title: My last resort

reviews.text: We did not use the spa or golf course during this trip. There is an indoor pool and an outdoor pool is under construction.
reviews.title: The Best Hotel Ever

reviews.text: i was at the ballantyne for a business meeting. the front desk/check in was top notch. the woman who checked me in efficiently set up a car for me to take to the airport the next day.
reviews.title: enjoyed the spa, Avg business center

likes.disliked: — business center was not up to par compared to the rest of the hotel

reviews.title: Needs Outdoor Pool, Otherwise Perfect
reviews.text: The rooms were standard-sized with two double beds which were extremely comfortable. The bathroom had an extra=large tub with separate shower. My room had a golf course view.
I ordered room service which was above average compared to most hotel room service meals.
reviews.title: Excellent choice in Charlotte

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The business center was below average--one of the two computers was broken but they allowed you to print as much as you liked for free.
reviews.title: Super Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the gym was very large and well equipped. the pool was a large indoor pool and there were about 5 kids really enjoying it.
reviews.title: excellent service and amenities for the price

likes.liked: — the gorgeous private club atmosphere of the lobby and the veranda
likes.disliked: — the view from the non golf course facing rooms

description: Experience hospitality at the Mobil Four Star and AAA Four Diamond Ballantyne Resort, in the heart of Charlotte, North Carolina. The Golf Course at Ballantyne offers 18-holes of Championship golf.
